overview: The young student Angela meet her old school friend Miriam again since many years. While Angela is pretty and successful, Miriam became an ugly criminal predator. During the conversation, she secretly steals the wallet from Angela and a short time later, on the pretext that she has found her wallet, to ring the bell at her home. Together with her criminal friend, the two ambush Angela and tie her up. In addition to accusations of her beauty and success, she also has to endure a lot of torture. But fear gives Angela unprecedented powers which she uses for her terrible revenge.
title: Deadly Enemy
